context_of_use: The user accesses their account settings to modify personal information.
description: Allow users to modify their personal account information and contact details.
triggering_event: User initiates a request to update profile information.
preconditions: User must be logged into the system.
User must have valid account credentials.
postconditions: User's profile information is updated in the system.
User receives confirmation of the update.
assumptions: User has access to the internet.
User has the necessary permissions to update their profile.
requirements_met: User can access their profile settings.
User can submit changes to their profile.
main_flow: 1. User navigates to the profile settings → System displays current profile information.
2. User modifies the desired fields → System validates the input.
3. User submits the changes → System updates the profile and confirms the update.
alternative_flows: AF-1 (from Step 2): User enters invalid data → System displays an error message and prompts for correction.
exception_flows: EF-1 (from Step 1): User is not logged in → System redirects user to the login page.
information_for_steps: 1. Current profile information including name, email, and contact number.
